      • AccountException

        public AccountException()
        Constructs a AccountException with no detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.

      • AccountException

        public AccountException(String msg)
        Constructs a AccountException with the specified detail message. A detail message is a String that describes this particular exception.

        msg - the detail message.
